attributes.action: Make at fault drivers in an accident to retake their test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was recently in a car crash in my first car (yes i'm a new driver and the accident wasnt my fault!!) the guy came out of a blind junction and hit the front nearside of my car causing it to be written off and me having to take an unpaid day off work. when i asked the guy if he saw me he said and i quote'no sorry mate i wasnt paying attention' this guy was like 55+yrs old and he jsut admitted being complacent in a car!!! i think that all people involved in an avoidable RTA who were at fault should be forced to retake the extended driving test.
